reviewText: Scantily clad, NOT. Full length heavy cotton nightgowns, most films of this genre have some TITillation,  it's not here. Cat fights with not a single button Pop!

Most of you young whippersnappers will find this movie a bit boring. I don't care: I love this stuff. Give me a bunch of women running around half-clothed in a detention center at odds with a bitchy ward attendent and I'm good for the night. It's a lot more mellow than I expected, but a nice surprise just the same. If you like the genre it makes a nice addition to your collection.
